enhanced_by.reason: The nextLong method relies on the Random instance provided during the construction of the RandomService object.
The nextLong(long) method can be invoked before nextLong() to set up a specific range for testing.
Both methods generate long values, and the nextLong(long, long) method can be used to verify the range of the nextLong() method.
Both methods generate random numbers, and the nextDouble() method can be used to compare the randomness behavior.
